customCssFile.description:
A path to a custom CSS file.

 Default: None

inputItemsGap.description:
Gap between input and result items.

 Default: `16`

maxItems.description:
Number of items to show before scrolling.

 Default: `8`

shadows.description:
Whether the window has shadows or not.

 Default: `true`

transparent.description:
Whether the window is transparent or not.

 Default: `true`

hotkey.description:
A Hotkey string that consists of one key or modifiers + keys.
 For example: `Space` or `Alt+Space` or `Alt+Shift+Space`.

 Default: `Alt+Space`

maxResults.description:
Max number of results to show per query.

 Default: `24`

tabThroughActionButtons.description:
Whether pressing `Tab` will cycle through action buttons or go to next result item.

 Default: `true`

directActivationCommand.description: Direct activation command for this plugin.

enabled.description: Whether this plugin is enabled or not.

includeInGlobalResults.description: Whether to include this plugin in results in global queries.

oneOf.description: Acrylic effect. Windows 11 only for now.
